service_name: VISUAL STUDIO ONLINE APPLICATION LIFECYCLE MANAGEMENT
page_content:
Trustmarque Solutions Limited

VISUAL STUDIO ONLINE APPLICATION LIFECYCLE MANAGEMENT

Take back control of your custom applications with our Visual Studio Online Application Lifecycle Management service. Centralised cloud-based source control coupled with our technical expertise enable smooth build, release, deployment, configuration, versioning, bug tracking and support. Enable rapid, trusted releases using our governance and the power of Microsoft's cloud services.

Features

  • Define source management policies to support your organisation's IT vision
  • Expert governance of third-party suppliers increases trust and transparency
  • Automated build and packaging reduce cycle times for new releases
  • Support for multiple source control options including Git and TFVC
  • Complexities of branching and merging are handled by our professionals
  • Visualise development progress with configured team dashboards
  • View and manage agile work backlogs and sprints
  • Integration with Microsoft Azure enables adoption of continuous deployment practises
  • Cloud-based load testing for assessing the performance of web applications
  • Run automated code unit tests to validate functionality before release

Benefits

  • Unify and control a distributed network of suppliers or contractors
  • Build trust in your software releases through professional code governance
  • Waste less test time by taking advantage of automated testing
  • Understand the behaviour of applications or services under load
  • Create and enforce best practise policies including .NET coding standards
  • Reduce release cycle times and respond quickly to organisation needs
  • Track the health of your application and understand change impact
  • Continuous integration ensures your applications are ready to be deployed
  • Minimise spend by paying only for compute resources you use
  • Get the right advice for your organisation

Pricing

£450 to £1250 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Day
